channel.title: 🏢 Shenzhen Institute of Advanced Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Shenzhen Institute of Advanced Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: TransAgent: Transfer Vision-Language Foundation Models with Heterogeneous Agent Collaboration
item.description: TransAgent empowers vision-language models by collaborating with diverse expert agents, achieving state-of-the-art performance in low-shot visual recognition.
